text: Kiramattu arapikalil cilar, (porukkuc cellatirukka) anumatikori (unkalitam) vantu karanam kurukinranar. Eninum, allahvaiyum avanutaiya tutaraiyum poyyakkiyavarkalo (anumati koramaleye vittil) utkarntu kontanar. Akave, ivarkalilulla (in)nirakarippavarkalai aticikkirattil mikat tunpuruttum vetanai vantataiyum
